Package math.geom2d.circulinear.buffer

Computation of buffer for circulinear shapes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CapFactory
    Generates a cap at the end of an open curve.
    JoinFactory
    Generate a join between two consecutive parallel curves.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BevelJoinFactory  
    BufferCalculator
    Compute the buffer of a circulinear curve or domain, and gather some methods for computing parallel curves.
    ButtCapFactory  
    MiterJoinFactory  
    RoundCapFactory
    Generate a circular cap at the end of a curve.

Package math.geom2d.circulinear.buffer Description

Computation of buffer for circulinear shapes.

The main class is BufferCalculator. Two interfaces are provided for controlling aspect of joins and butts, as well as several implementations for square, round, or direct join or butt.
